title: Search for Solutions
description: Use web search to find solutions to programming problems and errors.

initialFiles.content:
# Challenge: Search for Solutions

Use web search to find and fix issues in the code.

## Objectives
1. The code has a common React error
2. Search for the solution online
3. Fix the code and document the solution

bonusObjectives.description: Explain why keys matter for React performance
Show what NOT to use as keys

hints.text: The error message tells you what's wrong. Ask Claude to search for why React needs key props.
Try: 'Search for "React Each child in a list should have a unique key prop" and fix the code. Explain the solution.'
Ask: 'Search for the React key prop warning, fix UserList.jsx by adding key={user.id} to the list items, and create solution.md explaining why keys are needed and best practices.'

solution.approach: Search for the error message to understand and fix the issue.
solution.example: Search for the key prop error, fix it, and document the solution
alternativeApproaches: Look up React list rendering best practices
Search for common React warnings and fixes

learningPoints: Error messages make great search queries
Understanding why leads to better fixes
